channel.title: 商品 on Wahool对接接口
channel.description: Recent content in 商品 on Wahool对接接口

item.title: sku
item.description: 分页查询商家商品sku基础信息列表 BASIC Path: /seller/202405/product/sku/base-list Method: POST REQUEST Request Body: name required type desc example size NO integer 每页条数 默认 20，max 200 20 page NO string 第几页 默认 1 1 state NO object 状态 0 下架 1 上架 9待上架 99已归档 1 skuList NO array wahool sku列表 |─ NO string wahool sku WU66ECPM8B sellerSkuList NO array 商家自己的SKU列表 |─ NO string 商家自己的SKU B0CQ4JNC58 Request Demo: { "state": 1, "skuList": [ "WU66ECPM8B" ], "sellerSkuList": [ "B0CQ4JNC58" ], "size": 1, "page": 20 } RESPONSE

item.title: 库存
item.description: 批量修改库存数量 BASIC Path: /seller/202405/product/inventory/batch-update Method: POST REQUEST Request Body: name required type desc example YES array YES object |─sku YES string wahool Sku WU66ECPM8B |─quantity YES integer 库存数量 2 Request Demo: [ { "sku": "WU66ECPM8B", "quantity": 2 } ] RESPONSE Body: name type desc example code integer 响应状态码 200 message string 提示信息 success data object 数据包 locale integer 8 localeDisplay string GMT+8 Response Demo: { "code": 200, "message": "success", "data": {}, "locale": 0, "localeDisplay": "" } 分页查询库存列表 BASIC
